statements: SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_description FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_routes WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' ORDER BY route_description DESC;
SELECT route_description FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_routes WHERE disposal_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT route_id, disposal_method FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_routes WHERE route_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_description, disposal_method FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_routes WHERE route_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_routes WHERE disposal_method LIKE '%landfill%' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT disposal_location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_routes WHERE disposal_method = 'Incineration' OR disposal_method = 'Chemical Treatment';
SELECT route_description FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_routes WHERE disposal_method = 'Recycling' ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_method = 'Train';
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_description LIKE '%fast%';
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM waste_disposal_methods;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_name = 'Route 1';
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_method = 'Bus' ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_method IN ('Bus', 'Train') AND route_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT method_name FROM waste_disposal_methods WHERE method_description LIKE '%recycle%' ORDER BY method_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, route_method FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_description LIKE '%scenic%' OR route_method = 'Bike';
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes;
SELECT route_name, disposal_method FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods ORDER BY method_name DESC;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM HazardousWasteDisposalSites WHERE site_capacity > 1000;
SELECT route_id, route_name, disposal_date FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes ORDER BY route_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_name, disposal_method FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;

SELECT route_name, site_name, site_location FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes JOIN HazardousWasteDisposalSites ON HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes.route_id = HazardousWasteDisposalSites.site_id WHERE HazardousWasteDisposalSites.site_capacity > 100 ORDER BY site_capacity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT disposal_method FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes WHERE route_id IN (SELECT route_id FROM HazardousWasteDisposalSites WHERE site_capacity < 50);
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes WHERE disposal_method LIKE '%landfill%' AND disposal_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, disposal_method FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, route_description FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalVehicles ORDER BY capacity_kg DESC;
SELECT facility_name, facility_location, contact_person FROM WasteDisposalFacilities WHERE facility_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes ORDER BY route_name ASC, route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' OR disposal_method = 'Incineration';
SELECT facility_name, facility_location, contact_person FROM WasteDisposalFacilities WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;

SELECT route_name, disposal_method, route_description FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes JOIN WasteDisposalVehicles ON HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes.route_id = WasteDisposalVehicles.vehicle_id WHERE capacity_kg >= 500;
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteTypes WHERE waste_type_name LIKE 'Chemical%' ORDER BY waste_type_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM hazardous_waste_routes WHERE route_type = 'Land';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM hazardous_waste_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites WHERE site_location LIKE '%City';

SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, route_name, method_name FROM waste_shipments LEFT JOIN hazardous_waste_routes ON waste_shipments.route_id = hazardous_waste_routes.route_id LEFT JOIN transport_methods ON waste_shipments.method_id = transport_methods.method_id;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM hazardous_waste_routes;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_routes WHERE route_type='land';
SELECT * FROM waste_shipments WHERE shipment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM disposal_sites WHERE site_location LIKE '%City%';

SELECT route_name, method_name, site_name FROM hazardous_waste_routes JOIN waste_shipments ON hazardous_waste_routes.route_id = waste_shipments.route_id JOIN transport_methods ON waste_shipments.method_id = transport_methods.method_id JOIN disposal_sites ON waste_shipments.site_id = disposal_sites.site_id;
